description:
About Us:
Edge Media Systems is a leading provider of cutting-edge technology solutions, specializing in innovative media and communication systems. We sell and license optimally placed screen adjacent spaces to brands that want to engage, target, and connect with consumers. By utilizing the space around screens for persistent, low-cost advertisements, we reach audiences in a wide variety of innovative locations in spaces where they are already captivated and engaged. Please check the website out before applying. Linked below.

https://edgemedia.systems/

Job Description:
We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Business Development Manager to join our team at Edge Media Systems. As a Business Development Manager, you will be responsible for driving sales growth by identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, cultivating relationships with clients, and promoting our innovative range of media solutions.

Responsibilities:
• Prospect and qualify new leads through various channels
• Develop and maintain strong relationships with prospective and existing clients to understand their needs and requirements.

How to Apply:

If you are looking to get out of the rat race, spend time with your family, and make serious money. Please submit your resume and we will reach out!

This is a big opportunity as we have landed a large contract and need help fulfilling all orders/expanding our presence in new markets/territories.
• *AGAIN, MAKE SURE YOU HAVE LOOKED AT THE WEBSITE WE'VE LINKED ABOVE!!! DON'T TAKE AN INTERVIEW WITHOUT REVIEWING THE WEBSITE!! THIS IS 1099 TO START. CONTRACT. THERE IS NO BASE, PLEASE DON'T ASK ABOUT IT.**

https://edgemedia.systems/

Job Type: Contract

Pay: $50,000.00 - $365,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• Flexible schedule

Schedule:
• Choose your own hours

Supplemental pay types:
• Bonus opportunities
• Commission pay

People with a criminal record are encouraged to apply

Application Question(s):
• Have you reviewed the website?

Location:
• Tempe, AZ (Required)

Work Location: Remote
